null_check.target_query: select count(*) from product_dim where product_id is null or product_name is null or price is null or sales_date is null
null_check.null_records_query: select * from product_dim where product_id is null or product_name is null or price is null or sales_date is null

duplicate_check.target_query: select count(product_id) from product_dim group by product_id having count(product_id)>1
duplicate_check.duplicate_records_query: select product_id, count(product_id) as duplicate_count from product_dim group by product_id having count(product_id) > 1

column_mapping.source_query: select product_id ,product_name,round(price) as price,date_format(sales_date,'%d-%m-%y') sales_date from product
